item.title: Lock please, this was a stupid idea
item.dc:creator: @Mc131313 Mc131313
item.description:
@Mc131313 wrote:

[quote=“MisterZ, post:48, topic:95607”]I actually made a tut on that and they took it off but I’ll post it here.

[code]if (command.startsWith(“unmorph”))
{
String otherPName = command.substring(8);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
if (otherPIndex != -1) {
stillgfx(398, absY, absX);
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
p.isNpc = false;
p.updateRequired = true;
p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
p.sendMessage(“You start to feel normal”);
p.stillgfx(398, absY, absX);
}
}

if (command.startsWith(“morph”)) {
try {
int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(6,10));
String otherPName = command.substring(11);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
if (newNPC <= 10000 && newNPC >= 0);
if (otherPIndex != -1) {
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
p.npcId = newNPC;
p.isNpc = true;
p.updateRequired = true;
p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
p.sendMessage(“A magic spell changed you!”);
p.stillgfx(398, absY, absX);
} else {
sendMessage(“That name doesn’t exist.”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Wrong Syntax! Use as ::morph #### playerName”);
}
}[/code][br][size=1]Posted on: May 16, 2007, 05:02:03 PM[/size][hr]The first rule. Nobody replying to your post. He either thinks it’s a bad Idea or he’s busy. Like he keeps saying. He’s still working on the tut for Zenzie…[/quote]

tysm i would rep you if i could =(

item.title: Lock please, this was a stupid idea
item.dc:creator: @MisterZ MisterZ
item.description:
@MisterZ wrote:

I actually made a tut on that and they took it off but I’ll post it here.

[code]if (command.startsWith(“unmorph”))
{
String otherPName = command.substring(8);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
if (otherPIndex != -1) {
stillgfx(398, absY, absX);
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
p.isNpc = false;
p.updateRequired = true;
p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
p.sendMessage(“You start to feel normal”);
p.stillgfx(398, absY, absX);
}
}

if (command.startsWith(“morph”)) {
try {
int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(6,10));
String otherPName = command.substring(11);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
if (newNPC <= 10000 && newNPC >= 0);
if (otherPIndex != -1) {
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
p.npcId = newNPC;
p.isNpc = true;
p.updateRequired = true;
p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
p.sendMessage(“A magic spell changed you!”);
p.stillgfx(398, absY, absX);
} else {
sendMessage(“That name doesn’t exist.”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Wrong Syntax! Use as ::morph #### playerName”);
}
}[/code]
This is for turning people into npc’s and turning them back to normal. You type the code for unmorph as ::unmorph [PLAYERNAME] and for morph as ::morph #### [PLAYERNAME]. The #### is the NPC ID and it works the same as the ::pickup command. You must type 4 numbers even if it’s a 1-3 digit NPC ID. Such as 0001 – Man.
[br][size=1]Posted on: May 16, 2007, 05:02:03 PM[/size][hr]The first rule. Nobody replying to your post. He either thinks it’s a bad Idea or he’s busy. Like he keeps saying. He’s still working on the tut for Zenzie…

Read full topic

item.title: Lock please, this was a stupid idea
item.dc:creator: @Java3 Java ™
item.description:
@Java3 wrote:

Also impossible.

[code] case 73: //Attack (Wilderness)

if(PkingDelay <= 1)
{
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 859 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4214)
{
setAnimation(426);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
}
AttackingOn = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian();
client plz = (client) server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn];
int AttackingOn2 = plz.inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian();
if(server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn2] == null)
{
if(!nonWild() && !plz.nonWild() && plz != null)
{
IsAttacking = true;
inCombat();
setAnimation(GetWepAnim());
if(server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn] != null)
{
if(server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX != absX && server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY != absY)
{
faceNPC = 32768+AttackingOn;
faceNPCupdate = true;
}
}
} else {
sendMessage(“This player is in a safe zone and cannot be attacked”);
}
} else {
sendMessage(“This player is already under attack”);
}
}
break;[/code]

Flawless you zenzie bitch lol.
